\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\&\& {X_\bullet} \&\& {A^\Lambda} \\
	{\,} \&\&\&\&\&\& {\,} \\
	\&\& {Y_\bullet} \&\& {B^\Lambda}
	\arrow["{m_\bullet}", from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{f_\bullet}"', from=1-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{g^\Lambda}", from=1-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow["{s_\bullet}"{description}, dashed, from=3-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{n_\bullet}"', from=3-3, to=3-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
